description: Oksana Lintz, deeply unsettled by recent unrest and Council secrecy, requests emergency authority to access Halden’s private BCI controls. The Council, divided and under public pressure, reluctantly grants her temporary system clearance.

Oksana overrides broadcast protocols, sharing Halden’s fragmented confessions citywide. Citizens watch as Halden admits to orchestrating a manipulated crisis to test Stenograd’s social fabric, exposing years of purposeful stress and concealment.
Leaked Council footage from 2023 surfaces, showing Halden’s warnings about system trust and the dangers of concealment. Accusations mount against Council members for dismissing early red flags.

Neighborhood gatherings and broadcast debates spread as residents grapple with revelations. High-scored citizens are confronted by peers over past betrayals fuelled by BCI manipulation. Public anger and shame ripple through the city.

Oksana triggers full declassification of BCI system logs, unveiling widespread score manipulations and secret protocols. The revelations fracture city factions and ignite urgent calls for new systems of accountability and justice.
